content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We have a duty of care and legal responsibility to look after personal data and confidential information that relates to individuals in a way which keeps it safe from theft and misuse.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In addition, EPAM must comply with laws governing the processing, use and storage of personal data and international standards of information security. Failure to comply can have far-reaching consequences for EPAM, such as significant fines, criminal liability and damage to EPAM's reputation.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Some illustrative examples of negative consequences of improper personal data handling \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/muO4ag\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"may be found here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
